stable.changelog:
- Use text wrap in settings to prevent title text cut
- Fixed freeze loaf albums when opening app
- Drop raw format support to prevent some issues

beta.changelog:
- Fixed rotation menu not change in high definition images (Android 14)
- Fixed share menu not show user apps
- Fixed update layout height
- Fixed card switch padding
- (WIP) Force media scanner update when OTG to mounted
- Check if device have SD or OTG and request SAF authorization

alternative.changelog:
- Use text wrap in settings to prevent title text cut
- Fixed freeze loaf albums when opening app
- Drop raw format support to prevent some issues
